title: Financial Planning: What It's NOT And What It IS - Forbes
content: Financial Planning: What It's NOT And What It IS  Forbes
description: Financial planning is a blend of many elements including investment, insurance, tax, estate, retirement, and cash flow planning, but it is necessarily more than a rifled approach to any one of them. And at the core of the practice is not products, services, or proprietary strategiesâ€”but you.
